mapper.select: SELECT U.USR_ID AS USR_ID , U.USR_LGN_ID AS USR_LGN_ID , U.USR_LNM AS USR_LNM , U.USR_FNM AS USR_FNM , U.USR_GNDR AS USR_GNDR , U.USR_IS_GD AS USR_IS_GD , U.USR_EML AS USR_EML , U.USR_PHN AS USR_PHN , TO_CHAR(U.USR_BD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USR_BD , U.USR_SLF_INTDCTN AS USR_SLF_INTDCTN , U.USR_AVG_RTNG AS USR_AVG_RTNG , U.USR_GD_EXP AS USR_GD_EXP , U.GD_RP_CNT_ID AS GD_RP_CNT_ID , U.GD_PRFL_IMG AS GD_PRFL_IMG , U.GD_ID_IMG AS GD_ID_IMG , U.GD_CBC_IMG AS GD_CBC_IMG , U.USR_PYP_EML AS USR_PYP_EML , C.COUNTRY_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME , L.GD_LCN_ID AS LICENSE_GD_LCN_ID , L.GD_LCN_NM AS LICENSE_GD_LCN_NM , L.GD_LCN_IMG AS LICENSE_GD_LCN_IMG , CT.CITY_ID AS CITY_CITY_ID , CT.CITY_NAME AS CITY_CITY_NAME , CNT.COUNTRY_ID AS CITY_COUNTRY_ID , CNT.COUNTRY_NAME AS CITY_COUNTRY_NAME FROM USR_INF U LEFT JOIN COUNTRIES C ON U.GD_RP_CNT_ID = C.COUNTRY_ID LEFT JOIN GD_LCN L ON U.USR_ID = L.USR_ID LEFT JOIN GD_ACT_CT GAC ON U.USR_ID = GAC.USR_ID LEFT JOIN CITIES CT ON GAC.CITY_ID = CT.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN COUNTRIES CNT ON CT.COUNTRY_ID = CNT.COUNTRY_ID WHERE U.USR_ID = #{usrId} ORDER BY U.USR_ID, L.GD_LCN_ID, CT.CITY_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GD_LCN ( GD_LCN_ID , GD_LCN_NM , GD_LCN_IMG , USR_ID) VALUES ( #{lcnId} , NVL(#{lcnNm}, '라이센스 없음') , NVL(#{lcnImg}, '라이센스 없음') , #{usrId})
INSERT INTO GD_ACT_CT ( ACT_CT_ID , CITY_ID , USR_ID) VALUES ( #{actCtId} , #{cityId} , #{usrId})
mapper.select: SELECT CITY_ID , CITY_NAME FROM CITIES WHERE COUNTRY_ID = #{countryId}
SELECT 'LCN-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_GD_LCN_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') AS LCN_ID FROM DUAL
SELECT 'CT-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_GD_ACT_CT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') AS ACT_CT_ID FROM DUAL
